member.name: DWRITE_UNICODE_RANGE
member.summary: The DWRITE_UNICODE_RANGE structure specifies the range of Unicode code points.

member.name: DWRITE_UNICODE_RANGE.first
member.summary: The first code point in the Unicode range.

member.name: DWRITE_UNICODE_RANGE.last
member.summary: The last code point in the Unicode range.
